title: The Observer newspaper fonts
content: Does anyone know which fonts are used on The Observer newspaper?
author: anonymous

comments.content: If that last one (from Magnus) is the correct Observer, the font is [Bell Gothic Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20100423001050/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/bell-gothic/black/testdrive.html?s=Observer&p=72) but we can't know for sure unless Paperboy posts a sample.

You mean [this one](http://web.archive.org/web/20100423001050/http:/www.theobserver.com/)? Can't enlarge the front page unfortunately.   
Got a scan?

Maybe he's looking for the [New York Observer](http://web.archive.org/web/20100423001050/http:/www.sebastianblanck.com/jpegs/observer.jpg).   
   
The masthead is most likely hand drawn.
Paperboy, can you confirm if this is what you need?
You really need to post a sample for those of us who don't live in the UK.
